casebody.data:
State
v.
Rayford Lewis Burke 181A93-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Burke, Rayford Lewis. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of July 2016 by Defendant to Supplement the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Ervin, J. recused
